website_summaries.verdict: A top rattle choice from a well-known brand that's easy and fun for babies to use.
pros: Caregivers appreciate that this rattle is not too loud, yet loud enough to entertain babies
Users comment on its good quality, durability, and soft, safe design
We love the bright, vibrant colors and engaging design
cons: Tends to be best for younger babies

customer_reviews.title: Reported danger
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this and could hold it easily. Unfortunately we had to return it due to reports of recalls/defects. The battery casing is poorly placed, meaning drool can seep in and corrode the batteries making it a danger to babies health. My daughter chewed on it a lot and was very drooly with her teething, so it’s not worth causing potential harm even if it was her favorite
customer_reviews.author: WhitRN

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This rattle went viral in my Facebook moms group. Absolute peer pressure purchase, but totally worth it. This is my baby’s favorite toy. I wish it didn’t light up all the time in the diaper bag though because the battery went dead 2 months after receiving it. ETA: This toy leaks battery acid! DO NOT BUY, and if you already have, throw this toy out
customer_reviews.author: mb422

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best baby toy in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best baby toy out there! My daughter loved it from the time she was born till now.....and she just turned one! You can take it everywhere with you because it doesn’t make noise- just lights up and changes colors! I’ve given this as a gift many times too....nothing out there can compare for the price!
customer_reviews.author: daniella casey

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rattle because I thought the Nogginstik was outrageously priced in comparison. I think the handle needs to be a little bit longer (or my kid maybe just has big hands) and the light needs to change a bit easier, ya really have to shake it to get it to change. My son is interested in it for only a few minutes at a time, and usually drops it for another toy. It's a good portable option for a toy, but nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: lulup33

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy. I was specifically looking for something that lit up, but didn't make any musical/obnoxious noises for an overseas flight with our seven month old. This fit the bill perfectly! The critter end changes color with each shake, which mesmerized our little one while we were waiting to take off. The flight attendants and passengers seated near us were equally entertained. The rattle is also easy for little hands to hang on to, and our baby loves gumming it as well. We've had it for a couple of months and have not had to replace the battery. Easily one of our best toy purchases to date!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Russell

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for teething babies!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this in the mail today, but it's already a huge hit with our 7 month old. He is loving anything that makes noise and lights up, so this easily won him over. I was debating between this item and a similar one, but this one had the soft eyes for teething babies. A huge plus, since my son is chewing on anything he can get his hands on! The light turns off after it's set still for a while, automatically turns on when picked up and easily changes colors when moved around. Thanks for a great product Lamaze!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate sensory experience for developing brains
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old took hold and was captivated first time she saw it. It is great because its such a sensory experience- see changing colors with each shake, nom on the little plastic eyes (soft plastic), hear the gentle rattle shake and have control over the experience with her own hands which easy can grab it due to the thin handle. Seriously whomever designed this toy is genius. The best part is that no matter what your toy budget, this is something everyone could spring for. It's under $10 and it doesn't break the bank. It will keep your baby entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Celestiafae

customer_reviews.title: Battery Acid!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing upon receiving it however, after a while I noticed white stuff coming from the battery area. After looking, from where my child had chewed on it the battery’s had formed acid and was leaking out of the toy!! I’m glad I noticed it in time!! Please watch this toy!! It’s great at first however it’s not a safe toy at all! Wish I could get my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for Noggin Stik!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and less expensive option than the Noggin Stik. I wasn't sure if my baby would like it or not so I didn't want to spend $20 or more on the Noggin Stik, but she loves it! It's easier to change the color if you slightly tap the side rather just shake it. It will change if you shake it but it takes longer to change. The plastic material didn't bother me as it did some others. It's still really lightweight and some of it is rubber so it's good for teething or just sucking on it. This is definitely a toy to keep!
customer_reviews.author: C Beimfohr

customer_reviews.title: Cute rattle
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is the full package. Our son is just grasping and holding on to things at 5 months, but even before the noise and light was great to get his attention and help him start tracking with his eyes. He likes to suck on the eyes, but still hasn't quite figured out keeping it in his mouth. I would definitely suggest this to help baby develop and for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Dance for life

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first toy for infants!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old is obsessed with this! One of the only toys he will play with at this point! He loves to chew on the antennas, so thankfully this is super easy to clean and take on the go! It lights up with several colors to keep his interest and little enough for him to hold himself. Also, thankfully light enough that when he inevitably hits himself with it he never seems bothered. 🙈
customer_reviews.author: Shea Powell

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great rattle! The actual rattle is not overwhelming. I love how the light changes color when shaken. It is easy for my infant to grab and hold. The soft flower petals allow for chewing. As a speech pathologist I am picky about my toys, this one is fantastic and will gift it for now on. The stand allows me to use this during tummy time to stimulate reaching.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wenninger

customer_reviews.title: Great baby rattle to grab little ones attention!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute rattle, I love how it lights up! It really grabs my baby's attention! Nice and bright to attract baby's eyes! Has a nice light rattle sound, not overly loud but just loud enough! I like the skinny shaft as well because it's easier for baby's to grasp! This would be a perfect baby gift for a boy or girl!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: you actually have to shake it pretty hard for it to change colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it, in small doses anyway. I bought this as a cheaper alternative to a different toy that they sell, which is quite similar with a heftier price tag. However, you actually have to shake it pretty hard for it to change colors. My daughter is six months old, and I really have to give it a good shake for her to enjoy the colors. She will grasp it and "mouth" it for a minute and then drop it. She much prefers Sophie. But I guess it is unique! For $8, maybe she will like it more one day.
customer_reviews.author: Madlove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Learning Babies
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested to us by our Occupational Therapist for our 3 month old. The color changing lights are engaging, the thin handle allows her to grab it, and the "eyes" allow her to bring to her mouth, which is the skill we were working on. IT is a bit heavy if baby bonks himself in the head, but the same can be said for any toy. So far the battery is long lasting and the toy is well loved!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than competitor for the same toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 month-old loves this! We bought two. It is thin so her tiny hand can wrap around it. What is durable plastic and each time she hits it it turns a different color. They're the $20 version of a toy like this on the market that everybody swears by I'm so glad I found this before I bought that! It's the same thing and I got 1 and a back up for half the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute rattle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rattle! It’s so easy for baby to grab! It turns off by itself if it’s not being used and turns on as soon as you shake it! It’s so good to grab baby’s attention. I originally wanted to but the Nogginstick one but didn’t want to spend $20 on a rattle. This is a cheaper alternative it just doesn’t have the mirror on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Kept baby awake in car after dark.
customer_reviews.text: Had a long car ride and wanted something to entertain baby in car after dark. He loved it! Kept him awake until we got to our destination. Only downside is my husband didn’t like it when it went between the red and blue colors rapidly. Great toy in and out of the car. Great fun in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS FOR CHILDREN!!!
customer_reviews.text: The battery melted and rusted within the toy and we didn't notice until we went to change the battery. The battery died after only a few weeks (probably due to damage). We're so concerned that my 2 month old niece was putting a toy in her mouth that had melted and black batteries inside of it!! Hopefully nothing leaked out but I cant reccomend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!  :/
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Lamaze Rainbow Glow Rattle a little over a month ago for my 3 month old. My so loved chewing on it and following the light. Unfortunately the light went out a week or so ago. I ordered new ones to replace. I open the back panel to already find rust! I changed the batteries anyway but no luck. It's sad because he really did like this rattle but now I don't think I should give it back to him.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this! For teething, it’s “meh.” She chews on it, but I don’t think it’s a super soft product or it’s really great for teething in general. I’ll see how it goes as my baby gets older. She just turned 5 months and enjoys looking at this rattle nonetheless and shaking it. A bit frustrated at the price though when I bought it.. it was quite pricey and then dropped a ton! Sigh... anywho, we like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month baby is obsessed with this little thing! It’s soo much cheaper than the “other” light up rattle. The part my baby loves most are the little eyes that stick out. It’s perfect for her to suck and teethe on and it’s coated in a soft silicone for her gums. The stick fits perfectly in her little hands so she isn’t dropping it all the time. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and although my baby did love it, Her salivia got into it and the batteries are leaking acid. Definitely do not recommend as it's a hazardous toy
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the right price
customer_reviews.text: All around great toy. The only thing that could make it better would be if it were made with a softer material. Considering the light mechanism, perhaps that’s not possible. Still all around 5 star product. I don’t think I’d pay the $10.99 for it, but on sale at $4.99 when I bought it, hell ya!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: Rattle doesn't light up!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work! The 1st rattle I purchased didn't light up at all so, wanted to return it a and get a new one. The new rattle just arrived and it also doesn't light up! I'm done trying to purchase this toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mustard

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son hated this at first because he would get excited and then hit himself by accident with it. Once he got better motor control this has easily been one of his favorite toys. Keep batteries on hand though. I did have to replace after about 4 months of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: ambsraine

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy / light saber
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite toy from 3-6months. Great for teething, learning cause/effect, and gross motor skills. He loved the changing lights- we call it his mini light saber :)
customer_reviews.author: pharenheight

customer_reviews.title: Great for special needs/neuro development
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great for children or babies with special needs. My son has a neurological deficit and is developmentally delayed for his age, and this toy has been great to help teach him how to grasp toys, follow/track objects, and cause and effect with the shaking rattle noise and changing light. The light is not too bright or overstimulating and is also sensitive to touch or motion. The child can switch the color or activate the light with little effort. This has been our physical therapist's favorite toy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this rattle. He is just now becoming interested in toys and this is so easy for him to grab. His hands are very little still because he was small at birth so this is perfect. He also loves the rattle (and so do I because it’s not totally obnoxious) and the lights. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 month old son loves this rattle. He can easily wrap his small fingers around the stem. He loves to watch it change colors too. I bought this because it was highly recommended in a Facebook group for moms of babies his age, and I'm so glad I did, as it's his favorite toy now.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: 4 Month Old Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves this! Whenever I shake it she thinks it’s hilarious. It changes colors from blue, green and red. She’s not quite at a point where she could hold it herself, but I imagine it would be easy to hold once she’s ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Good item. My four-month-old daughter can hold it. What works for her next my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dotson Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son at about 3 months old he loves lights so this was perfect!!!! Everytime you shack it, it changes color and rattles. Blue, green, and red are the light colors. It is also great for teething the 2 eyes work great for him to chew on and he rubs his gums with them too the other nice thing is that the eyes and legs are a soft rubber like material but they don't bend. The green stick part is nice and thin which is great for tiny hands! Excellent product, thank you Lamaze!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Light up with joy!
customer_reviews.text: I must say this teether is so much fun! I saw in a past review that a mom thought the eyes were going to detach. WRONG! They do not, and this is great for teething. I feel very comfortable w my 5 month old baby boy having this product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Lame.... wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed not the color in the picture I got a yellow one I wanted an orange crab I know it's not that big of a deal it's just color but it does not say colors vary I wouldn't have bought it if so
customer_reviews.author: 🥀Mary🥀

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My son's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby toy I bought so far & it's one of the cheapest priced ones! I am ordering a few more for back up! Definitely worth the money!! My son loves it and I'm just as excited! Thank you!😊 The only thing that I didn't like is that the color looks red in the picture on amazon at the bottom of the rattle. But mine arrived pink. I don't know if there are different color options but I was just expecting the color in the advertisement . Still great toy anyway thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mommas

customer_reviews.title: ... hand me down from a relative and the baby loved it. It's great for teething and the color ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a hand me down from a relative and the baby loved it. It's great for teething and the color lights make him happy. The first one stopped working but we liked it so much we bought a second one! He's been using it for over 6 months and it's greeat for taking in the car or to a restaurant because it's small.
customer_reviews.author: 26summer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rattle!!!!!! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! We have owned two because I lost the first one. The light changing is fun anytime the color is bright. It fun at night in the car to distract. My daughters have enjoyed chewing on the little eyes! I bought them this at 6 months and they could hold it and shake it. My older kids even love shaking it for them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My baby’s fav toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a long time now and just had to change the batteries. My baby loves this toy out of the million he has. Great price and fun colors to Keep him amused. Def recommend those toy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph01

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip lighted rattle with teether potential
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this rattle! The 'stem' of it is east to hold, the eyes are great for teething, the lights are a great focal point and the rattle is easy to use. My only reason for taking a star off is the price, because I think $12 for a baby toy is a bit expensive. He does love it however and I don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Gave me a refund without returning. I guess we toss it?
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy for baby’s to hold!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one since the Baby Einstein rattle was back ordered on Amazon and then went away completely. It’s wayyyy cheaper than the Baby Einstein rattle ($22.95) and my baby loves it! The handle is small enough for his little hands, so he can hold it on his own. The colors are bright and catch his attention too. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lights don’t last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rattle over a competitors more expensive version. My daughter really enjoyed the large eyes to gum on and was mesmerized by the lights. Two weeks in, it has quickly become her favorite toy. However this morning we were both sad to discover the lights no longer work. I’m truly bummed with the lack of longevity
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Grand-daughter approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand-daughter. She gets mesmerized by the lights. The little eyes are soft and safe for the baby to chew on. The bottom part is a rattle. Not a noisy rattle...very soft. When she shakes it, it turns on and glows different colors as she shakes it. The light isn't bright and annoying. The rattle stops glowing if there is no movement.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend for younger than 5 months old.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was cute, my so kept hitting his head.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Excited mom!
customer_reviews.text: This will be a xmas present for my special needs 9 yr old who loves rattles!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price compared to the other brand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rattle! Purchased for my infant for Christmas it’s still working well! It’s not his go to toy but when I engage him with it the lights steals the show! It’s very bright for bedtime routine but we love it overall!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for baby.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loved it, and it actually kept his attention. It worked really well to keep his attention to take pictures. The only negatives are that he would occasionally smack himself in the face with it and you cane really only surface clean because of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!! 5+++ stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more than 5 stars. I was struggling to get my boy to hold things and he immediately held this. The colors are so bright I was so shocked!
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It actually changes color better with taps on the side than a shake, but my grandbabies love it. The ears on the top and sides are good for teething, too. Good for baby to follow to help learn rolling over, etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happyoldlady

customer_reviews.title: Good for teething and dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 month old at 5 months and wish I’d gotten it sooner. Excellent for teething and helping with dexterity. It changes colors when you rattle it and the rattle sound is nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Meowtha

customer_reviews.title: such a good rattle
customer_reviews.text: THE crabby rattle. Has lights that turn on, rattles when shaken, and easy nubs to chew; easily one of the favorites in all the rattles/teethers. And a bargain of a price. We love crabby rattle!
customer_reviews.author: Family T party of 3

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! Great teether and perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how much we LOVE this rattle! I have had the same one for 2 and a half years on the same battery! Babies have LOVED it enough to not give it back so we have bought a few extras to keep around and it’s an awesome gift for boys and girls! the little eyes are perfect for teething babies!
customer_reviews.author: MimiLove

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun for baby
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave this 4 stars is because I wish the eyeball antennas were softer for teething and so little one doesnt poke his eyes. He loves the lights and I love the skinny handle. Perfect for his little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves anything that lights up. This is great since it fits in his hand and he can see the colors while he chews on the top antenas.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Oliver-Neill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 month old. SHE LOVES IT! It's very easy for her to grasp and got her attention to help with tummy time! Definitely her favorite toy especially with teething!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The reviews were right!!
customer_reviews.text: Undoubtably the best toy for a baby that is just learning to grasp a toy!. The light up part isnt blinding to them like other toys. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great rattle
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is GREAT! It’s small enough for little hands to hold and the little eyes on top of the rattle are great to chew on. This was and still is our son’s favorite. Don’t hesitate, get this rattle for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: The plastic was cheap and hard but she loved that toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought something similar for my daughter during an extended hospital stay from the gift shop. Of course they charged an arm and a leg! The plastic was cheap and hard but she loved that toy. This has more of a rubber feel. Feels more durable and is cute. She likes it just the same. Definitely good for working on fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: This is my name

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a new graspy baby to grip and isn't obnoxious
customer_reviews.text: Got this 3 days ago and my 4 month old twins are mesmerised. The neck is easy for them to grip, the "eyes" are chewable and they're loving the glow. Everytime you shake it it changes colors(blue, green, red). The bottom red/blue part spins and rattles. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gregg

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I like that the eyes and hands are some kind of rubber so baby can chew on them. it also rattles and lights up. All the things I like in baby toys.
customer_reviews.author: Silverkm@imail.losrios.edu

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Love that it changes colors when you shake it, love even more that it doesn’t play any music! My son loves it, have one to my niece and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little toy because it lights up and grabs baby's attention but isn't noisy. Perfect for when noisy toys aren't appropriate. It does make a pretty quiet little rattle sound but no songs or other sounds. My son likes it, he also likes to chew on the little antenna things or eyes or whatever they are supposed to be. Good little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Farmer

customer_reviews.title: The best toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby when she was 3 months old and now at 5 months she is still obsessed. The lights are calming for her and it's so easy for her to hold an shake. She also chews on the eyes and really helps with teething. Great price and great toy. It's my go-to gift for new moms now.
customer_reviews.author: LBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Great product with multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: My 9mo old daughter loves lights and rattles so this was a no brainer for me. The bonus is she chews on the orange parts which help with her teething. Easy to throw in the bag or car seat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza A

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...take it or leave it
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh...it's ok. Baby is 10 months old and she could care less that it turns a different color when you shake it or hit a surface. It doesn't rattle enough for her to be interested in shaking it much and it doesn't have much to bite when she's teething. So all in all, disappointed that she's not more into it based on the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JenM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3+ months old. Even 2 year olds like it! Haha!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this rattler! I was looking for a small toy to bring with us on a road trip when he was 3 months old and this was perfect. Small enough for him to hold and the lights are so entertaining. Wish it rattled a little louder. Now he is teething and loves to chew on the eyeballs 😂 I’ve noticed this is a popular toy with my friends older kids too! So funny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is REALLY easy for her to grasp and lightweight so she can ...
customer_reviews.text: We noticed our daughter was fascinated by the glowing TV remote so we got this for her to play with. It is REALLY easy for her to grasp and lightweight so she can move it around very easily plus the eyes are the perfect size for her to chew on. The glow keeps her attention well and I like how it changes colors just by a shake which she can accomplish herself.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best teether and toy for motor and sensory development
customer_reviews.text: This teether has been the best so far. Baby loves the lights, plays with the rattle ( which is not annoyingly loud) and its very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer009

customer_reviews.title: My baby lost this so I ordered a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby lost this so I ordered a second one and it arrived and doesn’t work. Even after Replacing batteries and removed tab.
customer_reviews.author: Beth V.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quiet, light-up rattle!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old played with this rattle at our friend's house (it was a gift for their newborn). He LOVED it there, so I ordered one. He seriously loves this thing. I like it because it's not loud and annoying, just a soft rattle noise and lights up. He's obsessed. Mama's happy when baby is occupied and happy.
customer_reviews.author: FormerlyAGaulzetti

customer_reviews.title: Love this rattle
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this rattle. Got it at 6 months. Now he's 9 months and still likes to walk around with it and chew on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenibee1019

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rattle for early teething
customer_reviews.text: This is the second kid that I have used this rattle for and I love it! Both my kids are early tethers (two teeth before 3 months). Most teething toys are bulky and too difficult for baby to chew on. This rattle is perfect size for tiny hands and the rubber eyeballs are great for teething! I highly recommend for young babies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: My 6month old baby loves this item! It is easy to play with and hold. Unfortunately the light stopped working within about 3 weeks. I guess I have to replace the batteries but as a busy mom that hasn’t happened yet
customer_reviews.author: L. Warne

customer_reviews.title: Best rattle ever
customer_reviews.text: Best rattle! My daughter loves the colored light and it is very easy to hold because of the small "handle" on it. Would recommend for any baby.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 month old loves rattles and lights and this is the perfect combination. I like that it doesn't play annoying music or have to be turned on and off. She also loves to gum the eyes. She consistently gets excited about this toy and I like that the handle is thin so it is easy for her to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of my daughters favorite toys- keeps her entertained in the car- we take it with us on every car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Haloula1111

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’d buy this a million times over! Easy for my little guy to hold, the Nubs seem to be good for his gums as he is always chewing on them, and the light definitely holds his attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My little man started teething early and I needed something he could hold on to easy since he was only 4months old . so I found this and it was a great price, great quality, and had lights. This is one of his favorite toys. HAPPY BABY so HAPPY MOMMY.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for teething and grows with them!
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my baby through all stages! She is 8 months old and still enjoys shaking it and chewing on the eyes during teething!
customer_reviews.author: Kerstie

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this rattle to my 5-month-old on a flight, hoping it’d keep him entertained without being too noisy for nearby passengers. It worked! The baby was totally mesmerized. Three months later, this is still his ultimate favorite toy. I can’t tell you how many meltdowns this rattle has prevented or even reversed. Possibly the best few bucks I have ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rattle as it changes colors when it’s shaken. It’s all plastic so not good for a teether. Took a star off because there’s no way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Quenga

customer_reviews.title: Great for 8 month old
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old loves this light up rattle. It has very soothing colors that change automatically. She likes watching it change colors. It’s easy for her small hands to grasp and shake. Overall, she is entertained by it and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby toy
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy for my 3 month old to hold. The light is perfect to grab his attention but, not blinding.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fun .. affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love the innovation. Baby enjoys the color changes and the rattle sound. I worry about giving to baby since he might hurt himself with hard surface when moving around his face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. Drool proof, pretty colors, easy to handle, and rattles. What more could a baby ask for.
customer_reviews.author: clay siau

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this teething toy. The reason I only gave it 3 stars is because the batteries die very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest toy for my baby in her early stages. Very easy to hold & the light kept her attention.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Hill

customer_reviews.title: Im really glad that I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 month old daughter because she loves lights. She lives it and I feel so happy watching her play with it. It’s east for her to hold and the colors are bright and vibrant. My only “issue” with it is that the packaging says “soft eyes” and they aren’t soft? But she loves it regardless, i honestly believe it’s been a good toy for her to practice motor skills
customer_reviews.author: S.Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this rattle!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle! The little nub parts are easy for him to chew on and can't make it too far into his mouth. It's easy for him to hold and he loves banging the rattle part. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Best toy bought
customer_reviews.text: In love with this toy. My son is blind and he took to this toy right away, he’s always playing with it and chewing on its eyeballs . Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this rattle
customer_reviews.text: Lights up, small, easy for baby to hold, light weight, not very loud. All around awesome rattle
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle! And all of his baby cousins and baby friends love it too. Only complaint is that the battery didn’t last very long - maybe he just played with it too much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My babies LOVE this. Great for catching their attention and working on their range of motion in their necks as they follow. The little crab eyes are always full of drool because they are soft and easy to chomp on. Easily the best 8 bucks I've spent on them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for teething baby
customer_reviews.text: My twins favorite toy! Had to order a 2nd one. They love chewing on it and get excited for the lights
customer_reviews.author: E.R

customer_reviews.title: Nice little chew toy
customer_reviews.text: Has turned out to be a great teething toy. I had to take it apart and play with the batteries about ten times to get it to light up. Luckily, it started working and I didn’t have to get new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to the Noggin Stick
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy loves this - it's a great alternative to the Noggin Stick. It lights up in 3 different colors and the rattle sounds are pleasantly audible. The battery life has been great and we foresee this being a favorite for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn and we love it! Works great and the price is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy my 4 month old who is hard of hearing loves it. I was looking for a toy she could enjoy with lights since she cannot hear the sounds. I realized she doesn’t like to be in the car at night cause it’s dark and this toy helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves this rattle! It's easy for her to hold. The colors change, and they are nice bold colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

product_meta.title: Lamaze Rainbow Glow Rattle
product_meta.description: A happy baby is at the end of this rainbow! Specially designed for little hands, the Rainbow Glow Rattle features an easy-to-grasp handle with a happy little bug on the top that changes colors with a light shake. Watch in delight as the bug changes from blue to red to green! Featuring soft teething eyes and a twisting base, baby will quickly find a favorite toy in this rattle. Try it during the day or after dark for a mesmerising light show!
feature_bullets: Motion-activated illumination grabs baby's attention and helps stimulate visual perception
Give Rainbow Glow Rattle a shake and watch three contrasting rainbow shades come and go, helping stimulate baby's visual perception
Soft, chewy eyes for teething babies
A broad base adds balance and means you can place the rattle upright when not in play
Easy-grip handle and soft, curvy edges makes grasping and shaking safe and fun, promoting fine motor skills

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars964 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
